name: Word Tale
description:
Word game to connect and link!
Word story to read!

It is a word game to bring you a very special word puzzle experience.
It is a game about adventure and survival.
It is a puzzle game to train your brain and skills.

Just can’t wait to have a look? But wait and let's see what happened to this poor man first.

“I am Rick.
I've lived on this deserted island for months.
Why am I here? Thereby hangs a tale.
It was a sunny day and I was standing on the deck, enjoying the beautiful sea ahead. But suddenly I saw a girl sinking, helplessly, just in front of the ship. Without hesitation, I jumped into the water and tried to save the poor girl, only to find it was a wasted doll. I was more than angry. What's worse, the ship was gone when I turned back. No matter how hard I tried, I just couldn't find my ship back!!! Where the heck is my ship?
Lucky for me, an island showed up and I got a place to settle down temporarily...”

Such a tragedy, isn't it? Now you can help the poor guy to survive and find his way home. Just connect and spell words on screen, get all kinds of clues to save him.

Come on now! Get the right words and send the man home!
